name: Barrels O' Fun
description:
Barrels O’ Fun is a simple but challenging solitaire game where you match barrels to clear the board before time runs out. The faster you are, the higher your score.

Featuring 3 difficulty levels and complete in-game instructions, Barrels O’ Fun is sure to keep you entertained on the bus, between classes, whenever and wherever you go. Challenge your friends to see who can get the highest score.

To get a look at the gameplay, check out the "How-To-Play" video on our website at: http://web.mac.com/bensanborn/iWeb/BesqWare/BarrelsOFun.html
